amendment.description: To maintain enforcement personnel for the Environmental Protection Agency at the fiscal year 2003 level.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2171 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2171 proposed by Senator Lautenberg to Amendment SA 2150. (consideration: CR S14506-14507; text: CR S14506) To maintain enforcement personnel for the Environmental Protection Agency at the fiscal year 2003 level.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2171 proposed by Senator Lautenberg to Amendment SA 2150.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2171 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
